@Isychos

Kind of difficult to set this up without a way to send PMs right now, but if you're still needing some help, or just want to toss around ideas for your game, drop me an email at a.t.g.n.a.t. AT h.o.t.m.a.i.l.com (minus the dots, screw off spambots) and we can see about getting together in chat sometime this weekend.

I'm a little rusty with Quest right now to be honest, this will be a good opportunity for me to brush back up. Might even be able to drag XanMag in depending on how busy he is.

Posts.EditableText: Just don't read any of my posts, and you'll be able to understand quest and everyone else's posts, laughs. Welcome to quest, lurker! But in seriousness, don't be shy or embarrased, I'd be gld to help you out, though I'm not always that good at helping, and my posts can be intimindating and/or confusing, sighs. I myself started quest 4 years ago not knowing anything at all about programming as well as game making, and now I'm taking programming classes working slowly on CS (computer science: programming and etc) major.
